scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of the song 'Nobishiro'.
Transition with background music as the stage setup changes for the next song.
MC section where Watame talks to the audience and thanks the guests.

subtitles.original: ...腹の据え方 愛しの漕ぎ方
subtitles.english: ...the way I hold my ground, the way I pedal my beloved bike,

subtitles.original: 油の乗りに乗った濁った目した
subtitles.english: with muddy eyes that are in their prime,

subtitles.original: だわしない体が
subtitles.english: my sloppy body...

subtitles.original: 嫌われ方や慕われ方や
subtitles.english: the way I'm hated, the way I'm adored,

subtitles.original: 叱り方とか綺麗なぶつかり方
subtitles.english: the way I scold, and the beautiful way I clash...

subtitles.original: 覚えたことが山のようにある
subtitles.english: There are mountains of things I've learned.

subtitles.original: 伸びしろしかないわ
subtitles.english: I've got nothing but room to grow.

subtitles.original: (Wa!) 伸びしろしかないわ
subtitles.english: (Wah!) Nothing but room to grow.

subtitles.original: (Wa!) 伸びしろしかないわ
subtitles.english: (Wah!) Nothing but room to grow.

subtitles.original: (Wa!) 伸びしろしかないわ
subtitles.english: (Wah!) Nothing but room to grow.

subtitles.original: 俺らまだ伸びしろしかないわ
subtitles.english: We've still got nothing but room to grow.

subtitles.original: 「悪くないよねぇ？」
subtitles.english: "It's not bad, right?"

subtitles.original: 「悪いね」
subtitles.english: "It's bad."

subtitles.original:
ジャンキー
作詞・作曲：syudou
subtitles.english:
Junky
Lyrics & Composition: syudou

subtitles.original: 流行り廃りのない人生を探し続けていた
subtitles.english: I was searching for a life that doesn't go in and out of style.

subtitles.original: 月火水木金土日 もっと夢中になって
subtitles.english: Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat, Sun... Getting more obsessed.

subtitles.original: もういいかよ 何回聞いたって
subtitles.english: "Is it enough yet?" No matter how many times I'm asked.

subtitles.original: まだだよ 全感帯行っちゃって
subtitles.english: "Not yet!" Going through my whole sensory zone.

subtitles.original: もういいよってバイバイしたって
subtitles.english: Even if I say "That's enough" and say goodbye...

subtitles.original: 何だったんだ 黙超連覇
subtitles.english: What was that? Silent over-winning streak...

subtitles.original: 何故分かち合ってんじゃ
subtitles.english: Why are we sharing this?

subtitles.original: 着飾った愛を語ったって 行き詰まってジャンキー
subtitles.english: Even if you talk of dressed-up love, you're a stuck-up junky.

subtitles.original: 燻って嫌になっていく 承認欲求は飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: Smoldering and getting sick of it, I'm tired of the desire for approval.

subtitles.original: 本当飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm really tired of it.

subtitles.original: 飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm tired of it.

subtitles.original: 本当飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm really tired of it.

subtitles.original: 従って もっと夢中になって 固まってジャンキー
subtitles.english: Therefore, get more obsessed and freeze up, junky.

subtitles.original: 疑って早く配ってた その劣等感に飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm tired of that inferiority complex you were so quick to suspect and distribute.

subtitles.original: 本当飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm really tired of it.

subtitles.original: もうダメで単調なジャンキーは結構です
subtitles.english: No more, I'm done with monotonous junkies.

subtitles.original: 代わり映えのしない毎日を燃やし続けていた
subtitles.english: I kept burning through days that never changed.

subtitles.original: 月火水木金土日 ずっと立ち止まって
subtitles.english: Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat, Sun... Standing still all the while.

subtitles.original: 興味ないと不完全と言って
subtitles.english: Saying it's incomplete if you're not interested...

subtitles.original: 消耗品と散々荒らしちゃって
subtitles.english: Ruining it like a disposable commodity...

subtitles.original: 等身大も寛大に掲げ通したんだ
subtitles.english: I've held up even my true self with generosity.

subtitles.original: 黙超連覇 何透かしちゃってんじゃ
subtitles.english: Silent over-winning streak, what are you trying to hide?

subtitles.original: 着飾った愛も固い愛と それはそれでジャンキー
subtitles.english: Dressed-up love and tough love, both are junkies in their own way.

subtitles.original: 偏った愛に染まっていく 均衡方正も飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: Getting stained by biased love, I'm tired of balance and integrity.

subtitles.original: 本当飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm really tired of it.

subtitles.original: 飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm tired of it.

subtitles.original: 本当飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm really tired of it.

subtitles.original: 従って もっと夢中になって 固まってジャンキー
subtitles.english: Therefore, get more obsessed and freeze up, junky.

subtitles.original: 疑って早く配ってた その劣等感に飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm tired of that inferiority complex you were so quick to suspect and distribute.

subtitles.original: 本当飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm really tired of it.

subtitles.original: もうダメで単調なジャンキーは結構です
subtitles.english: No more, I'm done with monotonous junkies.

subtitles.original: 長い長い長い未来の想像描いてく
subtitles.english: Painting a vision of a long, long, long future.

subtitles.original: 時代じゃない 時代じゃない 自分次第だってな
subtitles.english: It's not the times, it's not the times, it's up to me.

subtitles.original: 笑っていたいし 夢中でいたいし 想っていたいし 歌っていたいよ 感情を
subtitles.english: I want to keep laughing, keep being obsessed, keep caring, and keep singing my emotions.

subtitles.original: 着飾った愛を語ったって 行き詰まってジャンキー
subtitles.english: Even if you talk of dressed-up love, you're a stuck-up junky.

subtitles.original: 燻って嫌になっていく 承認欲求は飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: Smoldering and getting sick of it, I'm tired of the desire for approval.

subtitles.original: 本当飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm really tired of it.

subtitles.original: 飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm tired of it.

subtitles.original: 本当飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm really tired of it.

subtitles.original: 従って もっと夢中になって 固まってジャンキー
subtitles.english: Therefore, get more obsessed and freeze up, junky.

subtitles.original: 疑って早く配ってた その劣等感に飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm tired of that inferiority complex you were so quick to suspect and distribute.

subtitles.original: 本当飽き飽きです
subtitles.english: I'm really tired of it.

subtitles.original: もうダメで単調なジャンキーは置いておいて
subtitles.english: Put aside the hopeless, monotonous junkies...

subtitles.original: 永久に厄介なジャンキーで結構です
subtitles.english: and I'm fine being a troublesome junky forever.

subtitles.original: ひゃ〜、楽しいな〜！
subtitles.english: Hyaa, this is fun!

subtitles.original: ここまで出演してくれた
subtitles.english: Thank you to all the guests

subtitles.original: ゲストのみんなも、ありがと〜！
subtitles.english: who've performed so far!

subtitles.original: いやぁ、ライブもね、終盤に差し掛かってきたけど、
subtitles.english: Man, the concert is entering its final stages, but

subtitles.original: みんなはどれくらい…
subtitles.english: how much is everyone...
